price: Nuko Farawo n’ingabo ze barabakurikira, maze (Farawo n’izo ngabo) barengerwa n’inyanja uko bakabaye!
arabic: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-atbaʿahum fir'ʿawnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami mā ghashiyahum
